home.nadeDbDescription: A tool for searching japanese sentences from multiple contexts.

feature1.title: Compatible with Anki
feature1.description: Save any sentence in Anki including image, audio, and multiple languages.

feature2.title: Download any sentence
feature2.description: Download sentences in multiple formats such as images, audios, and videos.

feature3.title: View the context of what you find
feature3.description: See what happened before or after a sentence.

feature4.title: Rich and diverse content
feature4.description: Enjoy different genres, different media, different voices.

support.title: Do you like Nadeshiko?
support.description: If you find this site useful, you can support our work and future development with a contribution on our GitHub, a donation, or by sharing this site with others.

batchSearch.title: Simultaneous Search
batchSearch.description1: This feature can be used to search multiple words at once. A list will be returned with the words that have been found in the database, and a link to that specific search
batchSearch.description2: To start, add some words on the box below
batchSearch.description3: Add one word per line, or a coma separated list of words
batchSearch.description4: You can only search up to

ankiSearch.title: Search in your collection
ankiSearch.description: Look for a card that you have in Anki and add an image and audio to it. It is necessary that the 'Key Field' is configured in the settings tab.

searchSettingsModal.title: Search settings
searchSettingsModal.exactMatchDescription: Perform an exact match search, without including conjugations or other results

reportModal.title: Report a problem
reportModal.description1: The sentences included on this page have been extracted using several automated tools. They go under a quality control before being uploaded, but sometimes sentences might still present issues.
reportModal.description2: If you find an error, please report it using the form below. It will be greatly appreciated.
reportModal.reason2: Audio is off-sync compared to the sentence
reportModal.reason3: Sentence doesn't have audio or image
reportModal.reason4: Image, sentence or audio are not appropriate (NSFW)

modal.title: Search your collection
modal.description: Find a card in your Anki collection and add image/audio to it. Requires 'Key Field' to be configured in settings.
modal.noCardsMessage: Try a different query or mine the sentence first
modal.errorMessage: No key field has been defined
modal.errorTip: Verify the key field is defined in Nadeshiko settings

toast.noSettings: No settings found. Please go to settings page and configure the extension.
toast.noCardToExport: No Anki card to export to. Please add a card first.
toast.cardAdded: Card has been successfully added to Anki
toast.cardAddError: Could not add card to Anki. Error: {error}

labels.errorMessage1: An error has occurred while doing the search.
labels.copiedcontent: The content has been copied to the clipboard.
labels.errorcopiedcontent: Error copying content to clipboard. Try again.
labels.copiedsharingurl: The URL has been copied to the clipboard.
labels.errorcopiedsharingurl: Error copying URL to clipboard. Try again.
labels.mtTooltip: This sentence has been machine translated, content might not be accurate

developer.keyCreatedMessage: Save this key, it won't be shown again.
developer.noKeysMessage: Create a new one for your apps or projects!

anki.successMessage: Connection with Anki has been successfully established
anki.errorMessage: Could not establish connection with Anki

troubleshootingTips.ankiRunning: Make sure Anki is running and the Ankiconnect addon is installed
troubleshootingTips.webCors: Make sure 'https://nadeshiko.co' is in AnkiConnect's webCorsOriginList settings
troubleshootingTips.adBlock: Disable any AdBlock extensions for this domain

anki.selectKeyField: Select the field that corresponds to your deck ID
anki.noFieldsMessage: Please try again or check your AnkiConnect connection

contentPage.emptyMessage: Stay tuned; it will be added later 😉

segment.noResultsMessage: We searched high and low but couldn't find what you're looking for. Try a different search.

searchContainer.errorMessage2: Try searching again with the button below.

labels.errorlogin400: Please check your email/password and try again.
labels.terms: By using this website you agree to our {terms} and to our {privacy}
